title: Is anyone sitting at 80-200 ping consistently tonight? are you with optus?
body: Every now and then, around this time, I feel as though my internet (optus unlimited/month) is quietly throttled during peak times. My ping is consistently higher as if I am playing on NA, and is not spiking. It is not the type of ping where it says 200 and feels 9000, it actually feels as though I have slow connection to NA servers. As you can imagine and have experience (i'm sure), this is pretty frustrating. I was just curious to see if anyone else has this issue tonight and who their providers are.

replies.body: and everyone in the game dcs ?
I'm with Orcon in NZ. I was getting similar issues. This may be the server itself, over everyone's IP. Id like to know what it is.
I have high ping since the last patch and DCed few times. I'm with iinet though.

Last night and again today i am typically having 400-1200 ping in a game. Towards the end of a game it usually drops back to 46 which is pretty normal for me. iinet is my isp. I played a couple of games with my son and daughter this morning that were alright then in the 3rd game  the 3 of us had high ping...really hard to walk let alone do anything else. Another person in the team had high ping (800-1000) but 5th person was normal.
I have the same problem but im with telstra, and pings with in this 2 months keep going up to 2XX

im not getting this but was getting the spikes of extreme lag, but its probably just optus being optus, i have to call then non-stop for them to fix my internet, i get really sick of it, just ring them up and complain to them, ask them what is going on.
